text: Shark Tale is a 2004 video game based on the animated movie of the same name. It was released by Activision for the Game Boy Advance, Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2 and Xbox on September 2004. ==Gameplay== The game lets the player play as Oscar for dancing and racing levels. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 video games Category:Vicarious Visions games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Video games about fish Category:Video games based on movies Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Xbox games Category:Windows games
title: Shark Tale (video game)
